ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The only reason you wouldn t be able to equip your newbie club is because you already have something in your primary hand slot.  Did you put your worn
ygData.messageBody:
> From: <edward001@...>
>
> >
> Training points? That implies training which I didn't get. I'll back
> track and see what I missed. My newbe weapon is a club. I haven't
> been able to use it because it won't equip. Maybe that's because I
> need hand-to-hand training to use it. I'll check that out. Thanks.


The only reason you wouldn't be able to equip your newbie club is because you
already have something in your primary hand slot. Did you put your worn candle
in that slot?

You don't need to train any points to be able to equip a weapon. And the club
uses 1 Hand Blunt skill, not Hand-to-Hand

Sulamwen
Warder of <Fate's Forge>
E'ci
